hero-title: Share, discover, and preserve your family's recipes traditions
email-sent: An email was sent to confirm your account.
upload-button: Upload PDF, DOCX, IMAGE or TEXT
upload-dialog-desc: Upload a file or paste your text content.
supported-formats: Supported formats: PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, PNG, WEBP (max 7MB)
error-file-size: File size must be less than 7MB
error-file-type: File type not supported. Please upload PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, PNG, or WEBP files.
error-text-length: Text must be less than {{max}} characters
toast-success: Check the form and save the recipe!
feature-1-title: Create and share your favorite recipes with ingredients, steps, and beautiful photos
feature-2-title: Save your favorite recipes for quick access and never lose track of the dishes you love
feature-3-title: Find the perfect recipe with the integrated search and filtering by tags
fp-subtitle: Enter the email associated with your account to reset your password
rp-subtitle: You can now change your password to a new one
da-subtitle: Here are your favorite recipes as well as the last added one
ec-subtitle: Edit your comment for this recipe
ac-subtitle: Add a new comment to this recipe
c-info: Your comment will be visible to other users
ar-subtitle: Add a recipe here using the following form
crop-subtitle: Resize the recipe image to fit the crop area.
block-confirm: Are you sure you want to leave? All your changes will be lost.
r-quantity-req: All ingredients must have a quantity and a description
r-all-steps-req: All steps must have a description
s-no-labels: No selected labels added for filtering
edit-recipe-subtitle: Edit the recipe using the following form
unauthorized: You need to be logged in to access this page
unexpected-error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
success-account-created: Your account has been created. You can now log-in.
invalid-token: The provided token is invalid or expired.
success-reset-email: An email was sent to reset your password
